name: lambda-api-gateway-example
description: Using the AWS SDK for JavaScript V3 to build and deploy Lambda functions on API Gateway.
author: brmur

scripts.build-lambda-2: webpack additem.js --mode development --target web --devtool false -o index.js
scripts.build-lambda-3: webpack sendemail.js --mode development --target commonjs --devtool false -o index.js
